resources.string: Enter Valid Phone Number to Received Code

An online exam preparation system that permits a candidates to register itself either through website or mobile application. After registration, preparation test system permits candidate either to select trail base test or paid test. On any selection a window displayed showing different types of test of different categories like HTML, PHP. If selection is trial based, then result is shown at every attempt. While, on selecting paid base option, total 40 question will be asked, showing question one by one with a time clock of 30 seconds. After that result will show on the basis of percentage. Admin of application can add subject type, subject categories and also input questions and their answer according to subject wise. Admin would also verify the user payment and after verification of payment, admin would activate the user requested exam for exam test preparation.
CODE TESTERS brings the best online qualified quiz testing system. Our team is fully dedicated and committed to impart its candidates with a hands on learning programming experience.

CODE TESTERS is excellent means to impart skills required to score well in the programming languages offered by us. it play an essential role in candidates motivation who are willing to do enhance programiing skills.
This Feature will be coming Soon!
1. Make Sure, Once you start your test, Perform it with full concentration.
2. Once if you click on Either at End Test button or Back Press, you will unable to perfrom further test.
3. On Click Next button, the new question wil be appear on screen
4. Total Time shown on the screen. You must be manage your time.
5. If availability staus showing true, then you will be able to perform the test.
6. Once you perform the given test, you will unable to perform that test again before 24 hours.
